storage::data::Error Class Reference

Storage error information. Call Environment::error() to get the last error in the current thread. More...

#include <storage/data/environment.h>

Public Member Functions

 Error ()
 Default to no error.
 
 Error (const dbs_error_info_t &other)
 Copy constructor.

Public Attributes

int code
 Error code listed in ittia/db/db_error.h or ittia/os/os_error.h.
 
const char * name
 Error name, with DB_ prefix.
 
const char * description
 Error description.
 

Detailed Description

Storage error information. Call Environment::error() to get the last error in the current thread.

Error names and codes are listed in ittia/db/db_error.h and ittia/os/os_error.h header files.
